statements: DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND login_result = TRUE
DELETE FROM login_analysis WHERE user_id = 100 AND analysis_id = 5;
DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE user_id = 123 AND login_time < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM login_analysis WHERE login_attempts_count > 5 AND last_login_time < '2020-12-01';
DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE username = 'testuser' AND ip_address = '192.168.0.1';
DELETE FROM login_analysis WHERE username = 'admin' OR reason = 'invalid password';
DELETE FROM failed_login_attempts WHERE user_id = 100 AND failure_reason = 'Invalid password';
DELETE FROM login_attempts WHERE user_id = 123 AND login_status = 'failed';
DELETE FROM failed_login_attempts WHERE login_time < '2022-01-01' AND failure_reason = 'Password Incorrect';
